sense.def:
To demonstrate a fact or theory
pomeni ljudem nazorno prikazati neko dejstvo ali teorijo.

seg.quote: Her latest book demonstrates how important freedom is.

sense.def:
To demonstrate something to someone
pomeni nekomu pokazati, kako naj nekaj stori ali kako nekaj deluje.

seg.quote: She has been demonstrating how you make bread.

sense.def:
To demonstrate a skill, quality, or feeling
pomeni pokazati, da imamo neko spretnost, lastnost ali čustvo.

seg.quote: She has not demonstrated much generosity.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
demonstrate
, sodelujejo na pohodu ali shodu, kjer kažejo svoje nasprotovanje ali podporo nečemu.

seg.quote: Why don't you go and demonstrate outside the embassy?
